org.sandag.popsyn.controls
Class AbstractControlDefinition<T,ControlDataType>

java.lang.Object
  org.sandag.popsyn.controls.AbstractControlDefinition<T,ControlDataType>
Type Parameters:
T - takes a generic type argument such as Household
ControlDataType -
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<IControlDefinition<T>>, IControlDefinition<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractGroupControlDefinition, BooleanControlDefinition, DiscreteIntegerControlDefinition, EnumControlDefinition, RangeIntegerControlDefinition
public abstract class AbstractControlDefinition<T,ControlDataType>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IControlDefinition<T>

This abstract class, which implements the IControlDefinition interface, sets the definition for PopSyn controls.

getParticipationFactor

public int getParticipationFactor(T controlObj)
Description copied from interface: IControlDefinition
Returns the participation factor for the object under inspection. Return value of 0 means the object does not meet the control definition parameters.

Specified by:
getParticipationFactor in interface IControlDefinition<T>
Parameters:
controlObj - An object to test against the implementations definition.
Returns:
0 if the argument object does not fulfill the definition. Positive integer if the argument fulfills the value. Some group implementations may return any positive integer which indicates the number of subobjects which meet the definition.
